relation: These guys are helpful and friendly if your respectful towards them. I have personally had to call them now on more than one occasion for a variety of reasons from locking my keys in the car to needing a jump for a dead battery.
My children and I bbq, swim, read, play baseball, and do different arts-n-crafts projects. I personally like to get a little fishing and hunting done when I can as well.

Spend time learning the library and dress professional if you want to be taken seriously by your peers. If you do not take your own education seriously the educators will not take you seriously. The point is if you want to be treated like a respectful adult then act and dress the part.

Tech has a friendly environment as long as you are friendly, and has plenty of activities to attend and enjoy. The parking can be confussing however, just make sure you look for the small signs that let you know if your tag can park there or not.
pageTitle: Arkansas Tech University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {191311=Although the cafeteria was just renovated, the food is still poor in quality, and breakfast is not served until 10:30, which is not practical for students who are in class from 8:00-1:0., 168885=There a few traditions within Tech that I am sure most colleges have, like a homecoming parade or holiday events, but there are a few unique to Arkansas Tech. Like the tradition to silly string the whole campus on April fools day, or dressing up for costume contests in October. Many traditions can only be shared with personal experience, so why not come find out for yourself?, 213928=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 117893=There are free movies pretty often on campus. During October, there are lots of Halloween activities. SAB sponsors lots of free events on campus throughout the year.}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students People that like to learn and have fun at the same time! Tips for prospective students Get applied early! Bang for the buck It's a good school. Am enjoying being here If I could increase the number of stars more, I would. People at Tech are very friendly, and everyone makes you feel very welcome! Am learning a lot Even though I've only been a student here for a few weeks, I'm already very impressed with the classwork and the professors in general!
